name: A Fine Network of Lines
description:
An interactive short story. A future on the verge of destruction sends you to attack and dethrone the god they blame for their troubles. Modified in order to survive the necessary rupture of subjective reality, you experience the world through your Terminal, a self-aware sense-filter and companion through the strange realms of objective psychism.

An entry into the Attack and Dethrone God game jam summer 2020.
